mapper.insert: insert into notices(title, content, category) values (#{title},#{content},#{category})
insert into notices(title, content, category, event_start_date, event_end_date) values (#{title},#{content},#{category}, #{event_start_date}, #{event_end_date})
mapper.select: select count(*) from notices where category = #{category} and del_status = false
select * from notices where category = #{category} and del_status = false order by notice_seq desc limit #{noticesStart}, #{numberPerPage}
select * from notices where notice_seq = #{notice_seq} and del_status = false
select * from notices where title = #{title} and content = #{content} and category = #{category}
mapper.update: update notices set title = #{title}, content =#{content} , category = #{category} where notice_seq = #{notice_seq}
update notices set del_status = true, del_date = now() where notice_seq = #{notice_seq}
mapper.select: select count(*) from notices where category = #{category} and title like concat("%",#{query}, "%") and del_status = false
select * from notices where category = #{category} and title like concat("%",#{query}, "%") and del_status = false order by notice_seq desc limit #{noticesStart}, #{numberPerPage}
